questions.question: What is the predominant color of the shoe's upper?
What is the primary material used for the shoe's construction?
Describe the overall pattern on the shoe's upper, considering color variations?
What is the style of the shoe; does it have laces?
What color is the sole of the shoe, visually distinct from the upper?
Describe the texture of the knitted upper, smooth or coarse?
What is the approximate shape of the shoe's toe-cap?
Considering the heel, is the back of the shoe high or low?
What is the apparent thickness of the shoe's sole?
Are there any visible seams or stitching evident on the shoe's upper?
Describe the appearance of the shoe's insole, visible or not?
What color are the secondary stripes on the shoe's upper?
Describe the overall design aesthetic of the shoe; formal or casual?
What is the height of the shoe's collar?
Considering the sole design, are there noticeable treads or patterns?
